Uses of Class
edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.flat.SentenceHMMState

  • Packages that use SentenceHMMState 
    Package Description
    edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.flat
    Provides an implementation of the Linguist that statically represents the search space as a flat graph, where each word in the vocabulary has its own branch.

    • Uses of SentenceHMMState in edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.flat
